title: Email server outage
description: The company's main email server is down, affecting all employees. Users are unable to send or receive emails.

title: Password reset for Jane Doe
description: User Jane Doe needs her password reset for her account. She is locked out and requires immediate assistance.

title: New hire software installation
description: Software installation and setup for new employee, John Smith, in the marketing department. Requires access to Adobe Creative Suite and Microsoft Office.

title: VPN connection issues
description: Multiple remote employees are reporting problems connecting to the company's VPN. Connection is unstable and frequently drops.

title: Request for new keyboard
description: Employee, Sarah Chen, has a malfunctioning keyboard and has requested a replacement.

title: Printer not working in Accounting
description: The shared network printer on the 3rd floor in the Accounting department is not printing documents. It shows an error message.

title: Access to shared drive denied
description: User Mike Davis is being denied access to a shared project folder. He needs read/write permissions for a folder named 'Project Alpha'.

title: Website login issue for customer
description: A customer is unable to log into their account on our website. The 'forgot password' feature is also not working for them.

title: Software update for design team
description: The design team requires a scheduled update of their graphics software to the latest version. This needs to be done after business hours to avoid interruption.

title: Trouble with video conference call
description: User Alex Kim is experiencing poor video and audio quality during all video conference calls. This is affecting his ability to participate in meetings.
